item.description:
This Meetup is Full!!  We will reschedule another if enough people are interested.

 

This month will be a lot of fun as Cindy Clark will lead us through a past life regression.  Cindy will help you prepare and set your intent prior to the session.  She has visited us before and everyone was pleased with what they saw!  Bring a journal with you so you can write down your experiences right away while they are fresh in your memory!

Be sure to bring enough food to feed at least four other people and be ready for some great conversations and company with like-minded people.
item.how_to_find_us: come to the upper porch and walk in!
item.name: past life regression!
